info.title: HubSpot Marketing
info.description: This connector is used to retrieve and make changes to HubSpot Marketing. HubSpot Marketing helps you attract the right audience, convert more visitors into customers, and run complete inbound marketing campaigns at scale.

get.description: Returns a list of forms based on the search filters. By default, it returns the first 20 hubspot forms.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

formType.title: Form Type
formType.description: The form types to be included in the results.

createdAt.title: Created at
createdAt.description: The date/time the form is created

updatedAt.title: Updated at
updatedAt.description: The date/time the form is updated.

archivedAt.title: Archived at
archivedAt.description: The date/time the form is archived.

richText.title: Rich text
richText.description: The rich text of the form.

objectTypeId.title: Object type ID
objectTypeId.description: The ID of the object type.

rangeStart.title: Range start
rangeStart.description: The start range of the objects.

rangeEnd.title: Range end
rangeEnd.description: The end range of the objects.

blockedEmailDomains.description: The email domains that will be blocked.

useDefaultBlockList.title: Use default block list
useDefaultBlockList.description: Whether to use HubSpot's default blocklist.

useCountryCodeSelect.title: Use country code select
useCountryCodeSelect.description: Whether to use the country code selected.

defaultValues.description: The default values of the object.

displayOrder.title: Display order
displayOrder.description: The display order of the items.

fields.description: The form fields included in the group.

fieldGroups.description: The field groups of the object.

notifyContactOwner.title: Notify contact owner
notifyContactOwner.description: Whether to notify the contact owner.

createNewContactForNewEmail.title: Create new contact for new email
createNewContactForNewEmail.description: Whether to create a new contact for new email.

prePopulateKnownValues.title: Pre-populate known values
prePopulateKnownValues.description: Whether to pre-populate with known values.

allowLinkToResetKnownValues.title: Allow link to reset known values
allowLinkToResetKnownValues.description: Whether to allow link to reset known values.

legalConsentTextColor.title: Legal consent text color
legalConsentTextColor.description: The style legal consent text color.

legalConsentTextSize.title: Legal consent text size
legalConsentTextSize.description: The style legal consent text size.

get.description: Returns a form based on the form ID provided.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

delete.description: Archive a form definition. New submissions will not be accepted and the form definition will be permanently deleted after 3 months.

put.description: Update all fields of a HubSpot form definition.

formType.title: Form Type
formType.description: The form types to be included in the results.

createdAt.title: Created at
createdAt.description: The date/time the form is created

updatedAt.title: Updated at
updatedAt.description: The date/time the form is updated.

archivedAt.title: Archived at
archivedAt.description: The date/time the form is archived.

richText.title: Rich text
richText.description: The rich text of the form.

objectTypeId.title: Object type ID
objectTypeId.description: The ID of the object type.

rangeStart.title: Range start
rangeStart.description: The start range of the objects.

rangeEnd.title: Range end
rangeEnd.description: The end range of the objects.

blockedEmailDomains.description: The email domains that will be blocked.

useDefaultBlockList.title: Use default block list
useDefaultBlockList.description: Whether to use HubSpot's default blocklist.

useCountryCodeSelect.title: Use country code select
useCountryCodeSelect.description: Whether to use the country code selected.

defaultValues.description: The default values of the object.

displayOrder.title: Display order
displayOrder.description: The display order of the items.

fields.description: The form fields included in the group.

fieldGroups.description: The field groups of the object.

notifyContactOwner.title: Notify contact owner
notifyContactOwner.description: Whether to notify the contact owner.

createNewContactForNewEmail.title: Create new contact for new email
createNewContactForNewEmail.description: Whether to create a new contact for new email.

prePopulateKnownValues.title: Pre-populate known values
prePopulateKnownValues.description: Whether to pre-populate with known values.

allowLinkToResetKnownValues.title: Allow link to reset known values
allowLinkToResetKnownValues.description: Whether to allow link to reset known values.

legalConsentTextColor.title: Legal consent text color
legalConsentTextColor.description: The style legal consent text color.

legalConsentTextSize.title: Legal consent text size
legalConsentTextSize.description: The style legal consent text size.

get.description: Returns the details of the Marketing Event with the specified id, if one exists.

parameters.name: externalEventId
parameters.description: The id of the marketing event to return
parameters.x-ms-summary: The id of the marketing event to return

parameters.name: externalAccountId
parameters.x-ms-summary: The account id associated with the marketing event
parameters.description: The account id associated with the marketing event

delete.description: Archives an existing Marketing Event with the specified id, if one exists.

parameters.name: externalEventId
parameters.description: The id of the marketing event to delete
parameters.x-ms-summary: The id of the marketing event to delete

parameters.name: externalAccountId
parameters.description: The account id associated with the marketing event
parameters.x-ms-summary: The account id associated with the marketing event

put.summary: Create or update a marketing event (Preview)
put.description: Upserts a Marketing Event. If there is an existing Marketing event with the specified id, it will be updated; otherwise a new event will be created.

parameters.name: externalEventId
parameters.description: The id of the marketing event to upsert
parameters.x-ms-summary: The id of the marketing event to upsert

get.description: Get all marketing emails for a HubSpot account.
Get the details for a specific marketing email.

get.summary: Get campaign data for a particular campaign (V1)
get.description: For a given campaign, return data associated with the campaign.
